text: 16:19 Ua Me Ini 23:6-8; Ofa Gami 19:15E fo, dagɨar gumaziba jasba apezepera me ganɨdiba, da gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itibagh ami, me damazir okavɨrɨzibar mɨn iti. Egha arazir kam uaghan gumazir aghuarir osɨmtɨziba puvatɨzibar kotiam gasɨghasɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazitam me apezeper kotiam gifarɨsɨ, dagɨaba me danɨngtɨ, me dagɨar kaba inian markɨ. Me guizɨn arazim gɨghan markɨ. Me kotiamɨn aven pazɨ gumazitamɨn akurvaghɨva, igharazitav dɨkabɨnan kogham. Me guizɨn arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ gumazamiziba bar me tuisɨgham.
